snippet.title: SPACE TALES - Teaser
snippet.description:
Space Tales is an RTS game about Space Exploration: land on uncharted planets, explore them, discover alien races & find out how to defeat them!

Set in a retro-futuristic environment, you take on the role of a commander in the Intergalactic Planetary Expansion (I.P.E.) and immerse yourself in a thrilling mission to explore and conquer new planets, pushing the boundaries of the Human Empire.

Developer: Saigon Dragon Studios
